version_description: Halloween edition: one seasonal character for FREE with this update! Download now and enjoy the game with ONLINE multiplayer!
Halloween edition: one seasonal character for FREE with this update! Download now and enjoy the game with ONLINE multiplayer!

Christmas Edition - a new awesome character, Claus, has arrived! Get Claus for FREE - just win 10 games in online MULTIPLAYER mode and let the world know that you are the best! Enjoy the game ;)

Merry Christmas!

Christmas Edition - a new awesome character, Claus, has arrived! Get Claus for FREE - just win 10 games in online MULTIPLAYER mode and let the world know that you are the best! Enjoy the game ;)

Merry Christmas!
Thanks for playing the game! Some fixes with this update.
Thanks for playing the game! Some fixes with this update.

Various bugs fixes and improvements. Let us know which features you wanna see next by rating the app - we read every comment and implement your best ideas! New characters are on the way, stay tuned! ;)

Various bugs fixes and improvements. Let us know which features you wanna see next by rating the app - we read every comment and implement your best ideas! New characters are on the way, stay tuned! ;)

Various bugs fixes and improvements.

Improve the game with us: let us know which features you wanna see next by rating the app - we read every comment and implement your best ideas!

Various bugs fixes and improvements.

Improve the game with us: let us know which features you wanna see next by rating the app - we read every comment and implement your best ideas!

Wow, it’s finally live - a whole bunch of hilariously awesome and long-awaited characters like:
- Donald D. (you know whom we meant :))
- Space King (sky-rocketingly funny)
- Master Chef
- Rufus
- such cuties as Frost, James, Mr. Moyer, Ma

Wow, it’s finally live - a whole bunch of hilariously awesome and long-awaited characters like:
- Donald D. (you know whom we meant :))
- Space King (sky-rocketingly funny)
- Master Chef
- Rufus
- such cuties as Frost, James, Mr. Moyer, Ma
Happy Easter to everyone! Download and enjoy this update - the game has become even better! Thanks a lot for your reviews and feedback. New characters and gifts are coming soon!
Happy Easter to everyone! Download and enjoy this update - the game has become even better! Thanks a lot for your reviews and feedback. New characters and gifts are coming soon!
Some bug fixes and improvements. New awesome characters are on the way, get ready!
Some bug fixes and improvements. New awesome characters are on the way, get ready!

8 NEW CHARACTERS and 8 NEW FATALITIES! Choose Gabe Freeman, Hunger Girl or Templar and all the rest. Find out what they can! What else? More daily gifts and option to save and restore your game progress via iCloud!

Don’t be shy, join the fun! Impr

8 NEW CHARACTERS and 8 NEW FATALITIES! Choose Gabe Freeman, Hunger Girl or Templar and all the rest. Find out what they can! What else? More daily gifts and option to save and restore your game progress via iCloud!

Don’t be shy, join the fun! Impr
Tournament mode can be autosaved now, so your progress will be safe! We fixed lots of crashes at your request to make your victory sweeter! Keep playing :)
Tournament mode can be autosaved now, so your progress will be safe! We fixed lots of crashes at your request to make your victory sweeter! Keep playing :)
Happy Independence Day! A special character has arrived - meet Crazy Sam! Sam is available only with this update, hurry up!
Happy Independence Day! A special character has arrived - meet Crazy Sam! Sam is available only with this update, hurry up!

Various bug fixes and improvements.
Various bug fixes and improvements.
Various bug fixes and improvements.

Check out TWO new FREE characters:
— Lol Vein, feel like a Hip-Hop star!
— Investor, he can make any enemy of yours rich!

Download this update and get new UNIQUE characters FOR FREE!

— Lol Vein, feel like a Hip-Hop star!
— Investor, he can make any enemy of yours rich!

Download this update and get new UNIQUE characters FOR FREE!

Back to School!

This update has NEW characters FOR FREE!
— Schoolmates, SPECIAL character that you can get FOR FREE!
— T-666 with his super destructive fatality!

Meet a new crazy character - Young Tree!
Also, a new awesome theme location!

And, of course, bug fixes and performance improvements according your feedback. Update now and enjoy the game!

Meet a new crazy character - Young Tree!
Also, a new awesome theme location!

And, of course, bug fixes and performance improvements according your feedback. Update now and enjoy the game!

Halloween has taken over Bowmasters!
Meet Stephanie the Witch with her magic broom! Enjoy spooky Halloween backgrounds, they will give you the shivers. Trick or treat!

Halloween has taken over Bowmasters!
Meet Stephanie the Witch with her magic broom! Enjoy spooky Halloween backgrounds, they will give you the shivers. Trick or treat!
With this update you can get more coins in the chest roulette! Update the game and enjoy!
With this update you can get more coins in the chest roulette! Update the game and enjoy!

We're happy to announce the Diamond subscription!
- 16 truly UNIQUE characters!
- Get gold and gems EVERY day for absolutely FREE
- Remove ALL the ads from the game

Additional new MEGA features:
- BRUTALITIES! Even more fun!
- NEW pa

New cool features have arrived! Also, we released a crazy game – Partymasters. Check App Store and download it now!

It's time to update your favorite archery game! Enjoy our newest features:
- There's a mystery box waiting for you in the game!

- There's a mystery box waiting for you in the game!

We are always trying to satisfy the desires of our players and to respect the users’ feedback. Thus, the new version 2.13 will delight you with:
– 6 great upgrades of characters and brutalities
– Updated Multiplayer
– Bug fixes

– 6 great upgrades of characters and brutalities
– Updated Multiplayer
